long_description: The savory, salty, delicious flavor of the Oberto All Natural Bacon jerky is the perfect trail snack; just be sure to bring enough for friends. Applewood smoked All Natural Oberto Bacon Jerky is made with premium strips of bacon and cooked to perfection; can't you just taste it at the end of a long day on the trail?. Cured with water, sea salt, sugar and natural flavoring. Gluten free. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
